website_summaries.verdict: While their sound quality isn't without issues, the TaoTronics TWS TT-BH053 are among the better sub-$50 true wireless earphones.
pros: The TaoTronics TWS TT-BH053 earbuds cost less than $50 and sound better than you'd expect for a true wireless model at this price
They offer solid wireless performance and 5 hours of battery life, and come with a compact charging case that delivers an extra five charges
cons: Charging case uses standard Micro-USB, not USB-C
if you don't get a tight seal, sound quality isn't as good
sounds a little bright (some presence boost)

customer_reviews.title: WOW 😲
customer_reviews.text: These soundliberty 53 earbuds have honestly surprised me! They come in such a small form factor when compared to other bluetooth earbuds and provide amazing value for the price point. When I initially received them, I didn't expect much. I just needed something that could play music, but I can honestly say these come close to even popular brands such as jabras elite. They sound good, bass is actually very good, and omg they're actually comfortable. Some earbuds tend to become very obtrusive in the ear after and hour or soo of listening but these fit very snug and don't hurt my ears. I honestly do recommend these earbuds, they don't disappoint whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: failed in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: First these earbuds keep falling out of my ears. I tried the different sizes of eartips but none worked. After one of the buds I returned to Amazon for a refund. I was contacted by TaoTrnics customer support about the buds and they offered me a a pair of over the ear headphones and different wireless earbuds which I received in only a couple days. The headphones are great, much better than I expected for replacements. They almost feel like professional grade headphones and sound great. Model soundsurge 46 The buds are the type connected together, these are much better and fit very well. Model soundelite 72 I appreciate the excellent customer service and would now buy their products again.
customer_reviews.author: MBCI

customer_reviews.title: Did not go the distance
customer_reviews.text: Much cheaper than AirPods Pros Price point Sound quality Ease of use They fit in the ear better due to the interchangeable ear pieces Cons Easily become unpaired from one another (This can be reset, but it happens so much that I use one at a time which works for me) Mine have been used on and off for one year, and now they don’t work when I put them in my ear, I have to tap them or twist them or other such foolishness. They were a real contender for an AirPod replace especially with Apples ridiculous price for the AirPods. Started strong, but could not go the distance.
customer_reviews.author: Goodhouse

customer_reviews.title: sounds like i was in a concert hall, dropped calls, and pairing problems
customer_reviews.text: negatives: during calls, you can hear the person you are speaking to clearly, but they were not able to hear me. the background noise was always an issue. i had to stand in one place and not move in order to be heard during my calls. they said i always sounded like i was in a concert hall because of the echoing. dropped calls for no reason. pairing would fail for no reason. i would install and uninstall from one week to the next because the Bluetooth would not connect positives: i liked the sound quality playing music and videos. comfortable in my ears I ended up returning these for another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Much like many of TaoTronics products, the SoundLiberty 53 wireless earbuds are truly amazing when considering its price. As of now, I have found every description and detail on the Amazon page to be correct! Everything works as described! Even the case is very small and portable, unlike various budget wireless earbuds. Furthermore, the earbuds come with four different sizes of eartips. Therefore, I believe that the in-ear fit is just about universal. I have just worked out in them, and they do not fall off whatosever! I do not know how long they will last, but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Julia MacCord

customer_reviews.title: These are outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: I never expect ear buds to make good bass. However, these actually do. They sound fantastic. Actually, if these have a fault it is that the highs can be slightly muddy. The touch controls work pretty well once you learn how to do them. These also sound pretty decent on calls. The ipods are better, but these are still good. These aren't noise cancelling, but when they are in, they significantly abate outside noise. Much like wearing good ear plugs. I can hear very well at normal volumes while driving freeway speeds in my old car with the windows down. In summary, for the money, I can't imagine there being another ear bud that is better.
customer_reviews.author: Lori and Vince

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is awesome, love it.
customer_reviews.text: I have several wireless earbuds. In my opinion, this brand is No.1. They paired my cell phone very well and quickly. The sound is absolutely great. I like to listen to music and news when I cook and exercise. They fitted on my ear perfect. And I don’t think they can fall out. Sometimes I didn't even realize they were in my ears. The battery is very good. Pick these earbuds with the better battery life, and you'll never need to worry about having to find a place to recharger your earbuds ever again. One more thing, the price is so nice. I am glad with this purchase. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Z

customer_reviews.title: Worked great at first
customer_reviews.text: I really LOVED these, and they initially worked great! They were perfect and a good price. However, they suddenly stopped working properly. Now I can’t get them to connect to my phone (no matter what I try!) even though for the last months they had been totally fine. I’m past the return window so I guess i’ll be stuck with non working ones :( They were great until this happened. Assuming it’s just a bad pair maybe? Otherwise i’d really recommend these as a budget friendly “air pod” option.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Camacho

customer_reviews.title: Love these at the price point.
customer_reviews.text: Im really liking these headphones. The sound quality is good and with the case the battery life is fantastic. I have had the need to recharge them yet. The wearing experience is really good as well. I have worn these for several issues without any negative feedback to report. I was hesitant when wearing them while exercising but was pleasantly surprised. While lifting they stayed put but while running I did have to adjust them a couple times. I have forgotten that they were true wireless headphones and dropped them thinking they were attached and dropped them but that is something I will get use to. Otherwise these are great for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: TBurk

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless headphones...if both would keep working
customer_reviews.text: So, my experience with these headphones was initially great. I would have rated them a 5 star all the way. Great price, great sound quality and battery life, etc. But now all of the sudden my right ear bud no longer works. No matter how many times you try to reconnect on bluetooth, only the left ear bud works. There is nothing coming from the right one. I don't know if there is something wrong in the charging case and the right one doesn't charge or if it is just a dud. But my return window is now closed and I am not pleased any longer with this purchase. I would not therefore recommend these wireless headphones.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shiflett

customer_reviews.title: so close and yet so far...UPDATED!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound quality, mic performance, noise cancellation and battery life. Why 2 stars?... They simple won't stay connected. --------------------- update May 9 2020: After returning these and getting refunded, the company reached out to me and offered a free upgrade. This amazing customer service deserves another star, and if the product is good, I'll add more accordingly. --------------------- update May 31 2020: Super impressed. Received the upgraded unit, which works perfectly. Talk about unusual and exceptional customer service! These guys earned my business and the 5 star upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: guitar guy

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter and she loves them! She tells me they're comfortable for long listening, the battery lasts a long long time and that she's happy that like that they don't try to look exactly like AirPods. I was curious so I gave them a try for several hours while I was working in the yard. I like the passive noise canceling, they block out a fair amount of noise but let through just enough so I don't feel like I don't know what's going on. I still prefer my AirPods Pro but those are like 5 times the price so there's really no comparison. For the price, these can't be beat in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cox

customer_reviews.title: great sound
customer_reviews.text: Super slick looking. It charges right in the box which the earphones fits snugly in. The set is in pretty clean white color which matches my ipad and iphone. I just love the sound quality above all else. It's sounds as if I'm listening to high quality headphone but without that heavy cost. I will travel everywhere with this and it hasn't fallen out yet. It may not be suitable for jogging. I haven't tried doing any sports with it yet but will update when I get a chance to test it some more. Again, I can't stress how great this sounds. Almost as good as my $200 bose headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Alphastorm

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quality is great!
customer_reviews.text: I have a problem buying just any earbuds because I have a small inner ear. AirPods just don't fit me, even with adapters. So I wanted to find something comparable that would accommodate my issue. These earbuds are smart, fit great and have a nice battery life. They're way less expensive than AirPods, but to me, the sound quality was just as good!!
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne M.

customer_reviews.title: great earbuds get the job done
customer_reviews.text: I needed a replacement for my wireless earbuds that I lost, and decided to get these as the battery life was much longer than my old pair. They work great for what I use them for: motivation at the gym. They're waterproof so sweat isn't an issue. the sound is great in my opinion, but I'm not an audiophile. I haven't done much running with them, so I don't know how well they will stay in if the sweat starts pouring. And I can't hear people talking near me when the music is playing, so that's a plus as well. The battery life is great, much better than my last pair that would only last about a week of workouts.
customer_reviews.author: MK Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on a high-quality pair of buds
customer_reviews.text: I'm starting to develop a love for this brand. This pair, especially, stands out from generic earbuds. The sound is wonderful, for starters, and the noise-canceling feature is robust. This is a nice, light pair of buds that feel like you are wearing nothing. They fit well, and it's easy to pick up calls, hang up, change songs, etc. I like this elongated charging case style for post buds, rather than the type that requires you to stick the posts down into a hole (just personal preference I guess). Two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick H

customer_reviews.title: Nice Packaging, Easy Set up, Good Sound
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. I would agree with the other reviewers that they're similar to airpods. I feel like they have similar touch functions. You probably will want to carry the case around with you so that you can charge them, otherwise they would remain on. They fit in my ears fine. Overall the sounds quality is great! To comment more on the sound, they're similar to other bluetooth headphones I have of Taotronics. They're more on the "treble high-end" side of things. Overall comparable to airpods but not near the price, and they pair great with my iphone.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Goering

customer_reviews.title: TaoTronics lives up to its name again!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using TaoTronics ANC Headphones for about a year now, and wanted to get a pair of True Wireless earbuds for wearing around the office. I decided to give these a shot, and I wasn't disappointed. The sound quality at the price point is perfect, and comparable to other brands like Anker. The charging case has a small form factor and is very light. The earbuds themselves don't have ANC, but block out noise very well because of the good quality silicone eartips. I'd recommend these if you're looking for a quality, entry-level true wireless pair.
customer_reviews.author: HM

customer_reviews.title: My First Wireless Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about getting wireless earbuds at first. Didn't think the sound quality or product quality would be up to daily use. I also got these for my daughter, but told her if she didn't like them, I would take them. Well, she won't give them back. She thinks they are even better in many ways than the Apple products. I tried them and was impressed by the sound quality and the battery life. I see her using them all of the time. If there was an issue with them, I would absolute have heard about it. I would like to get my own pair now.
customer_reviews.author: Iliad

customer_reviews.title: For me, better than the SoundLiberty 77
customer_reviews.text: This is a review of the SoundLiberty 53's but first let me explain that I gave the SoundLiberty 77's a so-so review -- explaining that the primary problem was that they just didn't work well for my ears -- and then literally gave them away. I'm giving the SoundLiberty 53's five stars because even though the 77's are probably better on paper, for me the 53's are great. I was surprised at how good the sound quality is, they're easy to set up, easy to insert and remove, well-made, and the charging case is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: ajgarvin

customer_reviews.title: can't hear clearly
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son to talk with his friend on the phone. It was hard to connect both earphones first, but we're able to connected. He can hear his friend's voice clearly, but his friends can not hear him. They tell us that my son's voice sounds like a robot, or can't hear clearly. We tested to call to several different devises, some of them are fine, but not all of them. Since we do not know why it's happening...I'm debating to return this product or not...
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: This was a waste of time
customer_reviews.text: They did not fit my ear, no matter which size cover I used. The noise cancellation was dismal. They lasted only a few hours with each charge. They were clumsy and did not come out of the charging box very easily. This is update to my original review. Although the earbuds were awful, the seller did the right thing by reaching out and offered an Amazon Gift Card.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These greatly exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a nice pair of wireless earbuds. Something comparable to AirPods but not as expensive. I saw these earbuds had very good reviews and the price was right. For less than half the price of AirPods, these earbuds really deliver! Sound quality is excellent, they are comfortable to wear and I've had no issues with them staying in my ears (though I don't use them to workout, so I can't comment about that). I would not hesitate to buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price, but not anywhere near the best UPDATED
customer_reviews.text: Connected quickly. No real instructions but not hard to figure out. not the most comfortable. After one 1 cause pain within ear. Stayed in my ear during workouts, never fell out. Just needed constant adjustment to stay in ears to get best sound. If you looking for bass, go somewhere else. UPDATE: Company contacted me and sent replacement (updated) set. Much better sound. Stayed in my ear during workouts, never fell out. Jut wish it had multiple ear fitments.
customer_reviews.author: James Cooper

customer_reviews.title: These are AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Battery life is excellent. I haven't measured it scientifically, but my guess is around 8 hours. Plenty! Just got these today so I can't vouch for the battery life yet. They fit my huge ear canals perfectly with the largest tips on them. The sound is full and bass is good. I'll update this photo once I get an idea of battery life. UPDATE: Battery life is as advertised. Very happy with these so far. WOOHOOO!!!TM Very impressed so far.
customer_reviews.author: RevJoel

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for the price
customer_reviews.text: Item came in good packing with buds of different sizes. Charged the earbuds overnight and tried to pair and it didnt work first time. scratched my head and then realized I didnt peel off the plastic on both ear buds. Removed the plastic protection cover on ear buds & boom pairing done in few seconds. Tested with 1 ear bud mode as well. I walk to work every day and replaced wired earphones with this ear buds. Sound quality , battery life and bluetooth pairing are good. For the money I paid , I am happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Pavan

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The sound is good, the fit is comfortable, and the bluetooth connection has been flawless so far. These are a really good quality pair of ear buds for the money. Apple's airpods may (or may not) sound a little better but I can buy 3 or 4 of these for price of the status symbol pair. In fact, I like these so much, I have bought 3 pairs. I keep 1 in the car so it's always available, 1 in the basement gym, and the other for general everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Gath

customer_reviews.title: Loved these at first -- now the left one won't hold a charge!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in June 2020, and absolutely loved them. For the price, they were just great, and I was thrilled with the purchase. Well, as of last week, not even three months later, the left earbud will no longer hold a charge, and gives me about two minutes of life before it turns off. It's after the return window, so I'm pissed off that I can't ask for a replacement! Very frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: SecretManta

customer_reviews.title: works great, worked right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: They worked right out of the box! they were almost fully charged when I got them, so only had to charge around 15 minutes. paired right up to my phone. I made some calls to friends to see how the sound quality was, and they said it was great sounding. Can't beat them for the price
customer_reviews.author: jc

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy to charge
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a gift for my dad. I have AirPods and he really likes them and makes the comment of wanting some wireless earbuds. AirPods were well out of my budget. I came across these and liked the reviews and the look of them. They work just as described. They have good sound quality, battery life, and truly cancel most noises. Very easy to charge too. Just out the headphones in the case and plug the cord in. You can’t beat the price either.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Happy Ending
customer_reviews.text: I've been happy with my other Taotronic headphones so I was optimistic about these. Unfortunately I found simple operations (advancing songs, volume control) very difficult. Maybe over time I'd get the hang but I'm sending these back. Update: Taotronics reached out to me and was very gracious. In addition to sending me a full refund they helped me find headphones that worked better for me. Always nice to interact with a company that cares about customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Paul D Knoch

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: This is my second ToaTronics product and I'm very satisfied with quality and durability. Specifically, this is well designed as ear shape and sound isolation if good despite it does not have active cancellation. Moreover, battery life allows me to have very long calls (never got "low battery" notice), and carrying case allows several recharges before being itself recharged.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Salvadori

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter's birthday. Wasn't sure how they would do given their price, but they work great! The battery life is very long, and the noise cancellation and sound quality are excellent. A nice feature is that when you only use one of the earbuds at a time, the other earbud doesn't play and use up its battery. They are comfortable in the ears, too. We are very happy with the purchase, and we would highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: myreviews

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Pair Purchased
customer_reviews.text: Great airpod alternatives (and only a fraction of the price). I had these in black and noticed they had white on a Lightning Deal and had to snag them. Taotronics had the ear buds before Apple which is why i was drawn to them. Even got a family member to purchase too! Sound quality is great, there is definitely some bass, and the case is rechargeable. With 2 hours daily commutes I really only need to charge once per week. Can't go wrong with these.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper89

customer_reviews.title: Great Wireless Earbuds!
customer_reviews.text: I've owned multiple pairs of earbuds, but have found that most don't fit my ear correctly and fall out when I go for a run. The only ones that seemed to stay in my ear were the old iphone earbuds (the circular ones), but the cord bouncing around was always annoying. I tried these out and they actually fit in my ear and don't fall out! I think the way it's shaped (with the long end) helps to keep it in place. The controls took some time to getting used to, but now it's easy to use. The sound quality is pretty good. Definitely would recommend for runners!
customer_reviews.author: Youki Sato

customer_reviews.title: Wow, So Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: These really are nice ear buds. I would highly recommend them for the price. These stay in my ears well, which the corded ones that came with my phone, not so much. I some times have issues with pairing. If I am using with the phone, I have to remember to turn off the Bluetooth on my iPad. But that’s on me not the ear buds. I would recommend these for your private listening.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound and noice-cancelling
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting these to have the sound that they do. I love the little case they come in as well. Very compact and easy to take with you. The noice cancelling is very good as well. When I'm listening to music, I can't hear other sounds around me. Controlling the volume, next track, play and pause takes some getting used to but it's the first time I've had wireless ear buds. Overall, I'd recommend these earbuds to anyone that is not willing to pay for the more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: kl

customer_reviews.title: Could be great
customer_reviews.text: Corrected: I dont think they buds had fully charged...after recharging them theu bith works and stayed connected. Happy customer I will say the phone calls are clear as it music. I give it 3 stars tho because the right buds works well...the left constantly says it is connected and disocnnecting on my ear repeatedly like it is unpairing and repairing. Quite annoying
customer_reviews.author: shart12283

customer_reviews.title: Workout. Handsfree at work. Or just relax at home.
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for over a week now for working out and for work. I have noticed the sound quality and battery life to be really good and they meet my needs. Only thing I would say about these is that the fit is not perfect for me. There are times when I am running outdoors and one of the earbuds come loose (this might just be my ears, who knows!?? Lol). Overall good product
customer_reviews.author: Tesh

customer_reviews.title: Tremendous Value
customer_reviews.text: I bought Apple ear pods but had second thoughts after the price. I returned them. Found these and was skeptical of the quality due to the price. But wow was I wrong! I will admit the bass and overall sound quality was slightly better on the Apples, but for this price and for what I use them for -- basically 30-45 minutes at the gym -- I am so incredibly satisfied. I'm debating getting a second pair to keep at work for when I want some music while working.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick H.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE - high quality product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Like other items I have purchased from TaoTronics, these bids deliver more than you expect for the price. They are not going to be exactly as good as the Apple version, but then again they do not carry the Apple price tag. They sound great, look great and charge quickly. I have not ran the battery until dead so I cannot say how long it lasts. They sound great and I would be happy if I paid twice as much as I did. I will keep buying TaoTronics products as they cost much less, but still provide great quality.
customer_reviews.author: David Warren

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive touch controls spoil this great product
customer_reviews.text: I wish there was some way to disable some of the touch gestures because it's way too easy to activate the wrong one. I keep dialing my iPhone or activating Siri on accident when I try to skip a song. Other than not being able to use the touch controls because they are way too sensitive - this product is great. Sound is good, microphone is good and they have good battery life.
customer_reviews.author: WB

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Wireless Ear Buds With Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this one based on my experience with the other Taotronics headsets so that I'll have one at work and one for home. As expected, this one is also extremely comfortable, with great battery life and amazing sound quality on par with headphones that are many times the price. I have been using this one at the gym and running outdoors and so far rain and sweat has not bothered it one bit. Great looking too!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Best wireless buds
customer_reviews.text: Best wireless headphones out there. I am a taotronics apologist. I learned my lesson a long time ago with wasting money on beats. I was concerned about pairing, but they pair easily. I love how they turn off when you put them in the case and they pair when you remove them. While they aren’t advertised as noise cancelling, they are ! I have three young kids and these have done the trick of juggling work and kids during covid. They also fit great when running with sweat...Well worth it, we have two sets.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Good for under $50 !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These do not have active noise canceling, but passively cancels out noise when u get a good fit. I switched the original eartips to one size smaller and they fit great. Bought this second pair for my sister. She likes the white color and uses them with the PC and her mp3 player. Loves it, and she says it doesn't hurt her ears. For the price, the sound is pretty good. Tho I wish the bass would be more prominent. They get pretty loud too. Call quality is ok, but my mom says that when she hears me using the headset, it can get breathy. All in all I would buy again. Good battery too.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Tzou

customer_reviews.title: Works great with my TV
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair of earbuds I've been buying over the past couple months and I definitely prefer these ones. I'm using them with my TV which supports Bluetooth. The battery life is great and the case to carry them is convenient. They also pair well with my iPhone. Battery life lasted longer than with the other pairs I have (26 hours vs 35+ hours with this new one).
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds just with a few small flaws
customer_reviews.text: I like how easily the earbuds connected to my phone Bluetooth however I few times I have had an issue with the only 1 earbud connecting. I also found my self accidently triggering the voice assistant alot trying to use the controls. And wearig them my sweatshirt hood triggered the controls a few times. Other than these few issue they are a great product and I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: B. Giaccio

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I've only used these for a short time, but out of the box they were ready to go and I didn't even need instructions to set em up, they're so easy. I haven't played with the tap controls yet, but without much effort they paired to my phone, fit great in my ears and have impressive sound quality for the cost. So far, I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: So far these have been amazing! I bought them for my daughter for Christmas (she's 12) and they were big for her ears (they stuck out and were slightly chunky). So I kept them for myself (even though I was sure I did not need wireless ear buds - I was WRONG, btw)! I got her a different pair, kept these little babies for myself and I LOVE THEM! Perfect sound, great for blocking out arguing children and I love them when I'm doing my household chores. SCORE!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan/April Myers

customer_reviews.title: Great sound cancellation for the price, can’t be beat
customer_reviews.text: I have many pairs of better earphones and headphones but wanted a cheap budget pair for trips where I am likely to lose them. This pair has good sound quality and noise isolation. It is much better than my standard AirPods. The pairing is easy and seamlesss for iPhones. The only con is it takes a while to charge, however, for this price I can’t complain.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Z

customer_reviews.title: Great product and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I always have good luck with Taotronics product and this was no different. I have a few pairs of these earphones and I got these because I wanted a white one. They look and work great. Very easy to pair and it connects great w my android phone and my ipad. Clear sound and very comfortable. Noise cancelling works fine too. Not the best, but I'm not using them for that reason, so no complaints. I love them! Definitely recommend to anyone looking for a quality product for the priace.
customer_reviews.author: E.Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to AirPods
customer_reviews.text: These are great alternatives for Apple's airpods. They have great sound and provide options for ear comfort-ability inside the ear canal, however, the part that rests on the outside of the ears is really big and isn't comfortable at all. I can stand it for awhile, but it gets uncomfortable pretty fast. Overall though, Taotronics makes good products and they are reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Braswell

customer_reviews.title: Best I've ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I love these earbuds! They have excellent battery life, very good sound AND call quality, and I like that they do NOT completely block ambient noise because as a mom I need to be able to hear what my kids are doing. Other earbuds that I tried did not work out well at all, so I was so relieved to find these.
customer_reviews.author: K. Spirek

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds and solid alternative to other expensive products!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic earbuds! Bought them for work to listen to music at my desk and being able to take calls on the move. Noise cancellation is scary good, almost to the point that you can’t hear anything else than what’s coming through the earbuds. Battery life is great, and may only charge them once a week or so. Fast charge also. White color looks sharp too! Would recommend to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: robert  d. zebrasky

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these wireless earbuds. They are very comfortable and don’t hurt my ears like a lot of other earbuds do. These fit in my ears a lot better and don’t feel like they are going to fall out. The case is very convenient, it makes it easy to store the earbuds. Also the setup to Bluetooth is super easy!
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Good for a few months then crapped out.
customer_reviews.text: *UPDATE: I was contacted by customer service and issued a partial refund in addition to a replacement at no cost to me. Excellent customer service! Received in January and they worked good until last week. Sound quality was good for the price but I had hoped they would laste longer. I guess you get what you it for. Can not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MzVibbz

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very good earbuds. Works very well and have almost no latency. Touch control is good, but I sometimes accidentally press it when taking it off or wiggling to have better sit. I guess that’s the way it is for touch controls. Sound is pretty good to me it has more bass than other smaller earbuds. Only downside for me is logo is ugly. For this price it is a win
customer_reviews.author: T. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Sound really good and very lightweight. Love the design and charging case. Feels like premium materials. Again with this brand i find really good performance and build quality at a very affordable price. Ive tried a similar pair, also by this company last year but they seem to have upped their game for sure. Im a fan.
customer_reviews.author: ryan c.

customer_reviews.title: My brother's recommendation
customer_reviews.text: I got these to drown out my office so i could work quietly and they are perfect! My brother purchased these awhile back and raved about how awesome they were and i completely agree! i have very small ears and I love that this pair comes with different sizes so they fit perfectly for me! Pairing is quick and easy and the battery life is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Bknotts

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality for the affordable price
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds are really lightweight and very comfortable and sound quality is amazing. They fit snug and bass sounds is much powerful. Pairing process was extremely easy. I tried to pair to my new VR headset and it was super quick. After that, these earbuds just automatically connects to my VR every time I take out of the case. Once you put them back into the charging case they automatically turns off and immediately starting to charge. charging case looks nice and has battery indicator. Overall, I'm very satisfied with this earbuds and would highly recommend these earbuds to anyone who is looking for a wireless earbuds with the absolutely phenomenal sound quality for the affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: SamJay

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing amazing headphones!! Crystal clear sound with deep bass. These are comparable to my AirPod Pros. The battery life lasts forever along with the charging case. Bluetooth connection is strong and it stays in my ears! That’s the one detail i look for with wireless earbuds and I’ve found them! I recommend these by a long shot.
customer_reviews.author: MyN. L.

customer_reviews.title: Bought them for Teenage son
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son, because he wanted air pods. I wasn't sure if he could keep from losing them. So I made him a deal if he took care of them we would look at air pods. Well he loves them, I don't think he will even want the air pods they fit great, they last a long time. Great product and excellent price
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good sounding. Well balanced including decent bass especially of you have the right size tips on them for your ear canal size. I have them in black and wanted some white buds for my other device I use just for music playing in the gym so I grabbed these again but in white this time.
customer_reviews.author: Incredible kluH

customer_reviews.title: Amazing earbuds.
customer_reviews.text: The overall quality is excellent, sound is great and stylish as well. For a fraction of what they cost compared to my AirPods Pro, this is worth every penny. Had I known about these earbuds before, I would’ve opted for these instead of the more expensive AirPods Pro. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.A-NYC

customer_reviews.title: Get 'em, you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! My partner and I used to both use the black version of these, and we'd often mix ours up. I got these white ones, and I LOVE them. They work just as perfectly as the others, but I prefer the color of these. These are great Airpod dupes at a fraction of the price. I prefer these over Airpods, anyway. They don't fall out- even during exercise, and unlike normal earbuds or over the ear headphones there is no discomfort after long periods of use. I use them everyday, and love 'em.
customer_reviews.author: Haily

customer_reviews.title: Just okay.
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth connection drops randomly at short distance. For example I usually carry my phone in a pocket by my waist and the signal will drop. Other times it will stop working entirely and I have to make my device forget these earbuds and then add them back as a new device. And they aren’t noise cancelling so much as noise blocking if they sit in your ears correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great overall airbuds.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these airbuds for almost a week and for now I am very satisfied with the results. I am not a person who likes to pay a lot for a pair of headphones so I was very happy when I found this product. I was impressed with the sound quality and the quick connection to my IphoneXs. I am satisfied and possibly going to buy another pair as a gift for my niece.
customer_reviews.author: J. Saraiva

customer_reviews.title: Good value, a bit touchy at times
customer_reviews.text: I got these head phones to replace the previous generation of the same one that I had lost. I was very happy with previous ones and the updated one looked pretty good. They look identical to the old one but have BT 5.0 which is a nice update. The fit and battery life are great and connection was easy and strong. I still dont like the touch controls as they seem to activate at weird times and turn on siri. For the price I paid I am very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Great value true wireless buds
customer_reviews.text: TaoTronics designs wonderful, inexpensive products, and these true wireless earbuds are not exception. Comfortable, nice sounding buds which hold a long charge . Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT C

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds at a good cost and durable
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son for Christmas and we all love the earbuds. He can listen to his rage metal(which I love but not while watching tv) and simultaneously not hear anything I say (which he loves). Truly though they are really great quality earbuds. I got my husband the regular headphones last year and the sound quality and noise reduction from this brand is great across the board! EDIT: These were left in said son's pants pocket and ran through the washing machine...twice...They still charged and they STILL WORK!!! Pretty Amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Fish 552

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of wireless ear phones for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of wireless ear phones and I am impressed. I don't use them regularly but the battery life seems good. They have good sound and the Bluetooth connection is great. I can walk a good ways away from my phone and they still play. Easy to connect to phones and computers. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck earphones!
customer_reviews.text: These earphones are great! The sound quality is very good and the mic is really clear when making phone calls. There are extra plugs that come with so you can adjust to your ear size easily. These are so easy to use and so much cheaper than some name brand earphones out there. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Jaymee

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds punch way above their weight. Sound quality is great, no connectivity issues, strong battery life, and they continue to be durable after 4 months of daily use in the gym. Not sure how - but these are much better than they should be - especially at this price. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Matt Miller

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: These feel clunky and the touch commands are not user friendly. Several times while trying to pause something, it ended up calling the last person I'd called - - at inappropriate hours of the night. Also, there is a way to get each ear to play separately, but then you have to reset them each time. I much prefer Anker Soundcore, which I had lost and replaced with these, trying to save a few bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good for value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to give a gift to my sister. I have another Bluetooth wireless earbud that I have used for the last two years. I did not know that Bluetooth 5 series has fast connection availability. The unit is good looking. I really like the sound quality and planning to buy the one for me.
customer_reviews.author: KY

customer_reviews.title: Good alternative to expensive Apple earbuds.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of wireless earbuds, so I didn’t want to spend $130+ for true Apple iPhone earbuds in case I didn’t like it. Not the case at all with these! VERY pleasantly surprised at the sound and clarity. Plus the variety of cushioned covers, the earbuds fit perfectly in my ear and don’t slide out. Use them in an office environment and they don’t cancel all the noise, but enough so others are not distracting you. Would highly recommend if you aren’t hung up on the Apple name.
customer_reviews.author: WDavis

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: They pair easily, sound great, and the batteries last. I use them every day for a 5 mile walk then return them to their charging case. I recharge the case every two weeks and have not had any problems. In fact the charging case indicates it is still half charged when I charge it. The fit is great, easy to use, and I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome W. Jantzi

customer_reviews.title: Good earbuds, a little hard to keep in ears
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds work considerably well, especially for the price. I was a little disappointed in the way that they sat in my ears--I hoped they would feel more secure and cancel more noise. Despite this, they are still quite good earbuds. The Bluetooth connection to my phone worked perfectly fine, and the touch control was super nice. I didn't get the chance to test the microphone. Overall it is a good product! I ultimately decided to return the product when I found a better deal on a pair of wireless earbuds. Customer service was extremely understanding in the return process. The product worked very well though, despite my choice to return it.
customer_reviews.author: A Flake

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound Earbuds With Surprisingly Clear Mic Built In
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a set of earbuds that pair easily with my iphone and with a functioning and good sounding mic, I have been using these at my office for phone calls and they work really well, leagues above my previous earbuds. They hold firmly in their magnetic case and are easy to take on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES these ear buds. Great sound quality, noise cancellation has been proven over and over again when she can't hear us ask her a question (LOL), and the case/battery charger/battery life is wonderful. She gets many hours out of a charge. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for walks around my college and bike rides, which these are perfect for. I was worried they would not fit my ear, but thankfully one of the included ear tips fits my ears perfectly. I have to charge these very rarely. The advertised amount of times the case can charge the earbuds seems to be accurate. Whenever you do have to charge the case, it takes less than an hour. As for sound quality, it is what I expected for the price, which is good. I can't imagine paying more than $100 for apple airpods when these are on the marketplace. I can highly recommend these earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: These earbuds are amazing for their price. I was looking for good quality earbuds that are cheaper than airpods and I would say that I achieved that. The sound quality is flawless and even during calls. Also I got these a month ago and only had to charge it a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Great, Affordable Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great wireless ear buds. Sound quality is awesome, light weight, battery life is long. Only problem for me is I have smaller ear canals so even the smallest ear bud size is still a bit uncomfortable so I can't wear them for too long. Not the manufacturer's fault so overall is a great item!
customer_reviews.author: Janna Luke

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound, Easy to Use, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought my girlfriend a pair of these headphones for her birthday and bought myself some a few weeks later. My girlfriend credits these headphones with relieving her sensory overload on public transit and her ability to socialize in group settings. They've become everyday accessories for me. I bring them everywhere and use them all the time. The sound quality is very decent, and the sound isolation gets better the more snugly sized ear tips you prefer. They hold battery for a long while and are easy to use. While not as seamless or packed with superfluous functions as some more expensive competitors, I cannot imagine being more satisfied with a device at this cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality for a quarter of the price!
customer_reviews.text: Got my headphones this week and I am super impressed. They have a nice snug fit when exercising. I’m a runner and was looking for something to stay put and also give me that sound quality I was looking for and these take care of both needs. Super easy to pair up with my phone and the battery life/charging case life is one of the best in my opinion. Came with different ear fittings and everything as described. I’ll for sure order more. My wife likes them and I know my kids would use them too. Overall awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Sound every bit as good as apple buds depending on the way they sit in your ears
customer_reviews.text: These are exceptional. Especially for the price. Depending on the way they sit in your ears they actually can sound better than the Apple bids or anything out there. Only had them for a short period of time but am very satisfied 2 months after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Not overspending for teen
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wanted I-pods for Christmas. These are way less money and she wears them every day. These devices are too small and lose-able to spend $140 for. Not to mention theft. This set had a coupon and they work fine. I'm made of value, not money.
customer_reviews.author: Partyof4

customer_reviews.title: Great Products... Phenomenal Service
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten to the point that whenever i need a personal electronic item, I look to see if TaoTronics makes it. I have been very happy with the quality, and, if something should go wrong, even much, much later... TaoTronics always comes through with whatever I need. These ear buds are great. I have bought them for every family member. They are very comfortable and the sound quality is very good. Simple to use touch controls as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Taotronics Quality and Value
customer_reviews.text: I always buy Taotronics. Quality. Value. Reliability. A little bit large, but sounds great and get more battery life than i expected. Takes a bit to get used to control system, but the more i use them, the more i enjoy them. GREAT for listening to in the house to block out all the other noise. I will buy more as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: G. SEGENREICH

customer_reviews.title: Good Generic Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality was impressive and the microphone worked well when I was on business calls. The shape will take awhile to get accustomed to since they are a little unbalanced. Definitely not name-brand quality but at 30% of the price, I found them to be priced appropriately.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Shay

customer_reviews.title: The best headphones ever
customer_reviews.text: Incredible headphones. I used to listen to them for about 6 hours a day, 5 times a week, and I’d only have to charge them once a week. They are fantastic! They pair really well with my phone, and the different earbud sizes make it so they never fall out of my ears.
customer_reviews.author: SchuylerSister16

customer_reviews.title: Economical alternative to Airpods Pro
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as alternative to the more expensive Airpods Pro, and I'm very pleased with my purchase. Bluetooth connection is simple. I've worn them while working out and I've not had a problem with these falling out. Noise cancellation is excellent as well. The case is sturdy, and the headphones charge quickly. They hold their charge for longer than my iPhone battery :)
customer_reviews.author: ykw

customer_reviews.title: Good set of wireless ear buds
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for almost a week and I like them. I had fought getting wireless ear buds but it was finally time. I’m still getting used to the controls for volume and things but they work well and stay in. I like the case charging also, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: A. Giron

customer_reviews.title: did not hold up
customer_reviews.text: used them for running. sound was good. controls seemed clumsy, hard to get correct. After a week they gave out and would not pair (only one worked at a time). tried going back to factory resets, then did not work at all.. returned them
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: DIDN'T WORK
customer_reviews.text: These are not even close to being a decent set o head phones, low volume, even at full power. Unable to communicate while talking to others.
customer_reviews.author: Sgt Press

customer_reviews.title: Best alternative to Airpods Pro
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I wanted airpods pro but didn’t want to fork out the money for it. These earbuds are a little bigger than I expected but I have small ears. They don’t move and have different silicone pieces to fit. These are really great quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Works great with iPhone and not too big for my ears
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I love the magnetic case, they pop in and out very smoothly. I also love that after you initially setup the Bluetooth, they turn on and connect to my phone automatically when I remove them from the case (and turn off when I place them back in the case). This automatic connectivity works whether you take out one or both. The battery life is great too, I have used them several workouts in a row without having to charge in between. Would definitely recommend to anyone who wants AirPods but doesn’t want to spend the money (and I think these fit better in my ears anyway).
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my 12yr old as a Christmas gift. At the time, I was only aware of the Apple brand earbuds. So I was a little reluctant to purchase him a pair of wireless earbuds due to the cost of them and the fear that he would misplace them. However, my wife really wanted to get them for him. So we ended up finding these instead of purchasing the Apple brand. He has loves them! He says they sound great, with good bass. He also stated the the battery life on them is pretty good as well. My wife also tried them out and stated that they sound excellent to her.
customer_reviews.author: David Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great company
customer_reviews.text: *UPDATE Company reached out and is fully standing behind their product. 100% happy! Delivered January 25, 2020 and worked great until today March 20, 2020. Left ear bud seems completely dead. No light, no sound. Case is fully charged and right earbud is 100% charged and working. Bummer!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Excellent alternative for AirPods
customer_reviews.text: I bought these earbuds as a gift for my mom as an alternative to the MUCH MORE EXPENSIVE airpods, these do not disappoint! They sound great and the calls are crystal clear. Taotronics does it again (I own multiple products from them)
customer_reviews.author: Nick

product_meta.title: Wireless Earbuds TaoTronics Bluetooth 5.0 Headphones SoundLiberty 53 Bluetooth Earbuds 40H Playtime Smart Touch Control IPX7 Waterproof Single/Twin Mode Earphones with Built-in Mic
product_meta.description:
Color:White

TaoTronics - Technology Enhances Life
Taotronics, a flagship brand under the Sunvalley group, is dedicated to providing superior-quality, reasonably priced electronic products that improve the lives of our customers. From our highly successful range of audio equipment to our bestselling LED lamps, our smart products aim to truly benefit our customer’s daily lives. Offering them an experience they can’t get anywhere else. We strive to develop, innovate and focus on utilizing the latest technology into easy-to-use devices.

Technical Specifications:
Bluetooth Version: 5.0
Connecting Range: 33ft
Charging Case Battery Capacity: 650mAh
Recharge Time: 2.5hrs
Earbuds Playtime: 5hrs
Total Playtime: 40hrs
Weight: 1.5oz
Dimensions: 3.2in x 1.5in x 1in

What's in the Box:
2 x Earbuds (TaoTronics SoundLiberty 53) 
1 x Charging Case 
6 x Eartips
1 x Micro USB Charging Cable 
1 x User Guide
feature_bullets: CD-like Quality Sound: TaoTronics SoundLiberty 53 offers a truly natural authentic sound and powerful bass performance with dynamic speakers and enhanced bass
40H Playtime Up to 5 hours playtime on one charge and a charging case holds multiple additional charges for up to 36 hours playtime Mini size charging case for easy storing in the pocket
IPX7 Waterproof High-level water-resistant makes it suitable for sports to prevent water and rain Ideal for sweating it out at the gym or running outside
Clear Phones Calls: With dedicated built-in microphones in each earbud to reduce vocal interference and blocks out environmental sound, you will enjoy crystal-clear phone talk
Single/Twin Mode for All Occasions with built-in mic in each earbud you can use a single earbud for working or use the pair to enjoy music alone or share with a loved one

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars4,508 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
